title: New Holland LX865 Skid Steer: How to Flush Water-Contaminated Hydraulic Oil & Prevent Future Issues.

tasks.task: Drain and flush hydraulic reservoir on New Holland equipment due to water contamination.
subtasks: Remove dipstick and siphon contaminated oil.
Use electric pump to extract remaining oil from reservoir.
Inspect reservoir cap and gaskets for wear or improper positioning.
Apply silicone sealant to gasket areas prone to water ingress.
Cover reservoir cap with a sealed plastic container.
Flush auxiliary hydraulic lines by bleeding them and collecting excess fluid.
Check and replace hydraulic filter if necessary.
